# Splatterhouse 

`BLES01120.savepatch`

### 1. Max Blood

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010003 C0FFEE00
93000000 00000180
28000000 000F423F
```

### 2. Unlock Classics

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 7365315F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365325F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365335F
0800000D 00000001
```

### 3. Max Blood

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010008 000001A8
0B00DA19 00000000
2800002C 000F423F
```

### 4. Unlock Skill Menu

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 536B696C
0800001A 00000001
```

### 5. Unlock Brutal Difficulty

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 42656174
0800000B 00000001
```

### 6. Unlock Classics

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 7365315F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365335F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365325F
0800000D 00000001
```

```
0800000E 00000001

```
